name: search.files
desc: Searches for files matching a query.

query.desc: Search query. May contain booleans, etc.

highlight.desc: Pass a value of true to enable query highlight markers (see below).

sort.desc: Return matches sorted by either score or timestamp.

sort_dir.desc: Change sort direction to ascending (asc) or descending (desc).

errors.no_permission: The workspace token used in this request does not have the permissions necessary to complete the request.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
errors.invalid_arg_name: The method was passed an argument whose name falls outside the bounds of accepted or expected values. errors.invalid_array_arg: The method was passed a PHP-style array argument (e.g. with a name like foo[7]). These are never valid with the Slack API.

errors.invalid_post_type: The method was called via a POST request, but the specified Content-Type was invalid. Valid types are: application/x-www-form-urlencoded multipart/form-data text/plain.
